    • Uses of GeometryRenderer in rendering.geometry

      Subclasses of GeometryRenderer in rendering.geometry 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlinnPhongRenderer
      This GeometryRenderer can draw meshes and splines by using the Blinn-Phong shading.
      class  SolidColorRenderer
      It can render RenderableComponents by drawing them with one color.
